Description

In this fake company, we create fake games for no one to play. We strive for excellence in making boring games. Most definitely don't play our non existing games.

History

Our company's history dates back to old days of Istanbul. All those hills were still forests. Then our great grandfather sold it to someone or something like that. So we are not rich.
